CVE-2015-0101.title: IBM Business Process Manager CVE-2015-0101 Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2015-0101.body: IBM Business Process Manager is prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input.      An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.      The following products are vulnerable:      IBM Business Process Manager Standard 7.5.x, 8.0.x and 8.5.x   IBM Business Process Manager Express 7.5.x, 8.0.x and 8.5.x   IBM Business Process Manager Advanced 7.5.x, 8.0.x and 8.5.x

CVE-2015-0102.title: IBM Workflow for Bluemix CVE-2015-0102 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2015-0102.body: IBM Workflow for Bluemix is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability.                                                                                                    Attackers can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information that may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2015-0107.title: Multiple IBM Products CVE-2015-0107 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2015-0107.body: Multiple IBM Products are prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because the application fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input.                                                              Remote attackers may use a specially crafted request with directory-traversal sequences ('../') to retrieve sensitive information and execute arbitrary code on server side. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2015-0114.title: IBM i Access for Windows CVE-2015-0114 Local Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2015-0114.body: IBM i Access for Windows is prone to a local stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability  because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied  data.                                                                             Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in  context of the application. Failed exploits may result in  denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2015-0125.title: Multiple IBM Products CVE-2015-0125 Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2015-0125.body: Multiple IBM products are prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input.                                                                        An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2015-0138.title: IBM Security Directory Server CVE-2015-0138 Man in the Middle Security Bypass Vulnerability

Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition. Apache Traffic Server 5.3.x prior to 5.3.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-3254.title: Apache Thrift CVE-2015-3254 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3254.body: Apache Thrift is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers may leverage this issue to cause infinite recursion, denying service to legitimate users. Versions prior to Apache Thrift 0.9.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-3257.title: zend-diactoros CVE-2015-3257 Open Redirection and Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-3257.body: zend-diactoros is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability and an open-redirection vulnerability. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site, this may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks or by constructing a crafted URI and enticing a user to follow it and when an unsuspecting victim follows the link, they may be redirected to an attacker-controlled site.

CVE-2015-3271.title: Apache Tika CVE-2015-3271 Remote Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3271.body: Apache Tika is prone to an information disclosure vulnerability. An attacker may exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information; this may lead to further attacks. Apache Tika 1.9 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2015-3280.body: OpenStack Nova is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2015-3289.body: Glance is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. A remote attacker can exploit this issue to exhaust system resources and cause a denial-of-service condition. Glance 2015.1.0 is vulnerable; prior versions may also be affected.

CVE-2015-3299.title: WordPress Floating Social Bar Plugin CVE-2015-3299 HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3299.body: The Floating Social Bar plugin for WordPress is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2015-3300.title: WordPress TheCartPress Plugin Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-3300.body: The TheCartPress plugin for WordPress is prone to the following security vulnerabilities: 1. Multiple HTML-Injection vulnerabilities 2. An access-bypass vulnerability 3. Multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities 4. A local file-include vulnerability Exploiting these vulnerabilities could allow an attacker-supplied HTML or JavaScript code could run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, perform unauthorized actions and compromise the application, and to obtain potentially sensitive information and execute arbitrary local scripts.

Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2015-4132.title: Aruba Networks ClearPass Policy Manager CVE-2015-4132 Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-4132.body: Aruba Networks ClearPass Policy Manager is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. Versions prior to ClearPass Policy Manager 6.4.5 and 6.5.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-4137.title: Milw0rm Clone Script 'related.php' SQL Injection Vulnerability

Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.

Exploiting these issues may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions, execute arbitrary script or HTML code within the context of the browser, and steal cookie-based authentication credentials. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2015-5049.title: IBM OpenPages GRC Platform CVE-2015-5049 SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2015-5049.body: IBM OpenPages GRC Platform is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.

CVE-2015-5057.title: WordPress Broken Link Checker Plugin CVE-2015-5057 HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2015-5057.body: The Broken Link Checker plugin for WordPress is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2015-5061.title: ManageEngine AssetExplorer CVE-2015-5061 HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2015-5061.body: ManageEngine AssetExplorer is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible. ManageEngine AssetExplorer 6.1.0 (Build 6112) is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2015-5064.title: MySql Lite Administrator Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-5064.body: MySql Lite Administrator is prone to multiple cross-site-scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.

CVE-2015-5065.title: WordPress Paypal Currency Converter Basic For Woocommerce Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2015-5065.body: Paypal Currency Converter Basic For Woocommerce plugin for WordPress is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information that may aid in further attacks. Versions prior to Paypal Currency Converter Basic For Woocommerce 1.4 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-5149.title: Zoho ManageEngine SupportCenter Plus CVE-2015-5149 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2015-5149.body: Zoho ManageEngine SupportCenter Plus is prone to an unspecified directory-traversal vulnerability because it fails to properly validate the user-supplied input. Remote attackers can use specially crafted requests with directory-traversal sequences ('../') to write to arbitrary files in the context of the application. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2015-5151.title: WordPress Revslider Plugin Cross Site Scripting And Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-5151.body: The Revslider plugin for Wordpress is prone to a cross-site-scripting vulnerability and an information-disclosure vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to obtain potentially sensitive information and to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.

CVE-2015-5162.title: OpenStack qemu-imge CVE-2015-5162 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2015-5162.body: OpenStack qemu-imge is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker may exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. This may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2015-5163.title: OpenStack Glance CVE-2015-5163 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2015-5163.body: OpenStack Glance is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain potentially sensitive information and perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks. OpenStack Glance 2015.1.0 through 2015.1.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-5167.title: Apache Ranger Authentication Bypass and Security Bypass Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-5167.body: Apache Ranger is prone to an authentication-bypass vulnerability and a security-bypass vulnerability. Attackers can exploit these vulnerabilities to bypass certain security restrictions, perform unauthorized actions; which may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2015-5170.title: Multiple Pivotal Products CVE-2015-5170 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2015-5170.body: Multiple Pivotal Products are prone to an cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2015-5175.title: Apache CXF Fediz CVE-2015-5175 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-5175.body: Apache CXF Fediz is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2015-5223.title: OpenStack Swift CVE-2015-5223 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2015-5223.body: OpenStack Swift is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2015-5286.title: OpenStack Glance CVE-2015-5286 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-5286.body: OpenStack Glance is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. A remote attacker can exploit this issue to exhaust system resources and cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2015-5295.title: OpenStack Heat CVE-2015-5295 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-5295.body: OpenStack Heat is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to exhaust system resources and cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2015-5353.title: Novius OS 'tab' parameter Local File Include Vulnerability
CVE-2015-5353.body: Novius OS is prone to a local file-include vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker can exploit this issue to obtain potentially sensitive information and execute arbitrary local scripts. This could allow the attacker to compromise the application and the computer; other attacks are also possible. Novius OS 5.0.1 (Elche) is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2015-5365.title: Zurmo CRM CVE-2015-5365 HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2015-5365.body: Zurmo CRM is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. Zurmo CRM 3.0.2 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2015-5378.title: Logstash CVE-2015-5378 Man in the Middle Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2015-5378.body: Logstash is prone to security-bypass vulnerability. Successfully exploiting these issues may allow attackers to perform unauthorized actions by conducting a man-in-the-middle attack. This may lead to other attacks.

CVE-2015-5434.title: HP Network Products CVE-2015-5434 Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-5434.body: HP Network Products are prone to an unspecified remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Exploiting this issue allows remote attackers to trigger denial-of-service conditions and gain unauthorized access. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2015-5452.title: Watchguard XCS Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-5452.body: Watchguard XCS is prone to following security vulnerabilities: 1. A remote privilege-escalation vulnerability 2. An SQL-injection vulnerability 3. A command-injection vulnerability Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database, gain elevated privileges, or to execute arbitrary commands within the context of the user running the affected application. This may aid in other attacks.

CVE-2015-5456.title: PivotX Cross Site Scripting, Session Fixation and Arbitrary File Upload Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-5456.body: PivotX is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability, a session-fixation and an arbitrary file-upload vulnerability. An attacker may leverage these issues to hijack an arbitrary session or gain access, execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site and steal cookie-based authentication credentials or upload arbitrary files within the context of the vulnerable application.

CVE-2015-5457.title: PivotX Cross Site Scripting, Session Fixation and Arbitrary File Upload Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-5457.body: PivotX is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability, a session-fixation and an arbitrary file-upload vulnerability. An attacker may leverage these issues to hijack an arbitrary session or gain access, execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site and steal cookie-based authentication credentials or upload arbitrary files within the context of the vulnerable application.

CVE-2015-5459.title: ManageEngine Password Manager Pro 'SQLAdvancedALSearchResult.cc' SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2015-5459.body: ManageEngine Password Manager Pro is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. An attacker can exploit this issue to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Versions prior to Password Manager Pro 8.1 Build 8101 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-5471.title: WordPress Swim Team Plugin 'download.php' Arbitrary File Download Vulnerability
CVE-2015-5471.body: The Swim Team plugin for WordPress is prone to a vulnerability that lets attackers download arbitrary files because the application fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker can exploit this issue to download arbitrary files within the context of the web server process. Information obtained may aid in further attacks. Swim Team 1.44.10777 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2015-5473.title: Samsung SyncThru CVE-2015-5473 Multiple Directory Traversal Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-5473.body: Samsung SyncThru is prone to multiple remote directory traversal vulnerabilities. A remote attacker can use specially crafted requests with directory-traversal sequences ('../') to execute arbitrary code or cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2015-5528.title: WordPress Floating Social Bar Plugin CVE-2015-5528 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2015-5528.body: The Floating Social Bar plugin for WordPress is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. Versions prior to Floating Social Bar 1.1.6 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-5531.title: Elasticsearch CVE-2015-5531 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2015-5531.body: Elasticsearch is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using directory-traversal characters ('../') to access arbitrary files that contain sensitive information and perform other attacks. Elasticsearch 1.0.0 through 1.6.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-5957.title: Remind 'var.c' Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2015-5957.body: Remind is prone to a buffer overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts will likely crash the application.

CVE-2015-5999.title: D-Link DIR-816L CVE-2015-5999 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2015-5999.body: D-Link DIR-816L is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions. This may lead to further attacks. D-Link DIR-816L running firmware 2.06.B01 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-6375.title: Cisco Networking Services CVE-2015-6375 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2015-6375.body: Cisco Networking Services is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks. This issue is tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCux18010. Cisco Networking Services (CNS) running on all versions of Cisco IOS are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-6400.title: Cisco Emergency Responder CVE-2015-6400 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2015-6400.body: Cisco Emergency Responder is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. CVE-2015-6404.title: Cisco Hosted Collaboration Mediation Fulfillment CVE-2015-6404 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2015-6404.body: Cisco Hosted Collaboration Mediation Fulfillment is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. CVE-2015-6411.body: Cisco FirePOWER Management Center Software is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information that may lead to further attacks. This issue being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCux37061.

CVE-2015-6419.body: Cisco FireSIGHT Management Center is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks. This issue is tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCur25410.

CVE-2015-6426.body: Cisco Prime Network Services Controller is prone to local command-injection Vulnerability. CVE-2015-6585.body: Hancom Hangul Word Processor is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2015-6586.title: Huawei WLAN AC Products CVE-2015-6586 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2015-6586.body: Huawei WLAN AC Products are prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks. The following products and versions are affected: WLAN AC6005 V200R005C00, V200R005C10, and V200R006C00 WLAN AC6605 V200R005C00, V200R005C10, and V200R006C00 WLAN ACU2 V200R005C00, V200R005C10, and V200R006C00

CVE-2015-6589.body: Kaseya Virtual System Administrator is prone to an arbitrary file-upload vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to upload arbitrary code and run it in the context of the web server process; other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2015-6607.body: SQLite is prone to multiple local privilege-escalation vulnerabilities. Successfully exploiting these issues may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges.

CVE-2015-6861.body: HP HPE Helion Eucalyptus is prone to an unauthorized-access vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions, gain unauthorized access, and perform unauthorized actions. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2015-7274.body: Dell iDRAC6 is prone to a vulnerability that let attackers execute arbitrary commands. CVE-2015-8235.title: Spiffy CVE-2015-8235 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2015-8235.body: Spiffy is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker can exploit this issue using directory-traversal characters ('../') to access or read arbitrary files that contain sensitive information or to access files outside of the restricted directory to obtain sensitive information and perform other attacks. Versions prior to Spiffy 5.4 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-8256.title: Axis Network Cameras CVE-2015-8256 HTML Injection and Cross Site Scripting vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-8256.body: Axis Network Cameras are prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability and multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2015-8285.title: QuickHeal CVE-2015-8285 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-8285.body: QuickHeal is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service condition. QuickHeal 16.00 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2015-8356.title: Bitrix CVE-2015-8356 Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-8356.body: Bitrix is prone to multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in an SQL query. An attacker can leverage these issues to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Bitrix mcart.xls module versions 6.5.2 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-8458.title: Adobe Acrobat and Reader CVE-2015-8458 Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2015-8458.body: Adobe Acrobat and Reader are prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected applications. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2015-8481.title: Atlassian JIRA CVE-2015-8481 Email Image Attachment Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2015-8481.body: Atlassian JIRA is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow an attacker to bypass certain security restrictions to perform unauthorized actions. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2015-8519.title: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager FastBack CVE-2015-8519 Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2015-8519.body: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager FastBack is prone to an stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because the application fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with the system privileges. Failed exploits will result in denial-of-service condition. The following products are affected : IBM Tivoli Storage Manager FastBack 6.1.0.0 through 6.1.12.1. IBM Tivoli Storage Manager FastBack 5.5.

CVE-2015-8520.title: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager FastBack CVE-2015-8520 Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2015-8520.body: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager FastBack is prone to an stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because the application fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with the system privileges. Failed exploits will result in denial-of-service condition. CVE-2015-8562.title: Joomla! Core CVE-2015-8562 Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2015-8562.body: Joomla! is prone to remote code-execution vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue allows attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application.

CVE-2015-8563.title: Joomla! Core CVE-2015-8563 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2015-8563.body: Joomla! is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to perform unauthorized actions in the context of a logged-in user of the affected application. This may aid in other attacks. Joomla! 3.2.0 through 3.4.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-8570.title: Lepide Active Directory Self Service Password Reset Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2015-8570.body: Lepide Active Directory Self Service is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability because it fails to adequately restrict access to the 'password-reset' feature. Successfully exploiting this issue will allow attackers to bypass security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2015-8571.title: Autodesk Design Review CVE-2015-8571 Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2015-8571.body: Autodesk Design Review is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code on the affected system. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2015-8577.title: McAfee VirusScan Enterprise Local Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2015-8577.body: McAfee VirusScan Enterprise is prone to a local security-bypass vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. Versions prior to VirusScan Enterprise 8.8.0 Patch 6 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-8578.title: AVG Internet Security Local Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2015-8578.body: AVG Internet Security is prone to a local security-bypass vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. AVG Internet Security 2015 build 5736 with Virus Database 8919 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2015-8579.title: Multiple Kaspersky Products Local Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2015-8579.body: Multiple Kaspersky products are prone to a local security-bypass vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. The following products are vulnerable: Kaspersky Anti-Virus 2015 MR2 Kaspersky Internet Security 2015 MR2

CVE-2015-8749.title: OpenStack Nova CVE-2015-8749 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2015-8749.body: OpenStack Nova is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2015-8759.title: TYPO3 'typoLink()' Function Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2015-8759.body: TYPO3 is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. TYPO3 6.2.0 through 6.2.15 and 7.0.0 through 7.6.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-8796.title: Apache Solr CVE-2015-8796 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2015-8796.body: Apache Solr is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2015-8798.title: Multiple Symantec Products CVE-2015-8798 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2015-8798.body: Multiple Symantec products are prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability. Remote attackers can use specially crafted requests with directory-traversal sequences ('../') to access arbitrary files in the context of the application. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2015-8799.title: Multiple Symantec Products CVE-2015-8799 Binary Planting Vulnerability
CVE-2015-8799.body: Multiple Symantec products are prone to a remote binary-planting vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow attackers to execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2015-8820.title: Adobe Flash Player and AIR MPEG-4 File Handling Multiple Memory Corruption Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-8820.body: Adobe Flash Player and AIR are prone to multiple memory-corruption vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2015-8831.title: Dotclear 'admin/comments.php' Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2015-8831.body: Dotclear is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. Versions prior to Dotclear 2.8.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-8855.title: Semver CVE-2015-8855 Regular Expression Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-8855.body: Semver is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions. Versions prior to Semver 4.3.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-8856.title: Node.js CVE-2015-8856 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2015-8856.body: Node.js is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. Versions prior to Node.js 1.6.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-8858.title: Node.js uglify-js Package CVE-2015-8858 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-8858.body: The uglify-js Package for Node.js is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Successful exploitation of the issue will cause excessive memory or CPU resource consumption, resulting in a denial-of-service condition. Versions prior to uglify-js package 2.6.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-8859.title: Node.js send Package CVE-2015-8859 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2015-8859.body: Node.js send package is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue allows attackers to obtain sensitive information that may aid in further attacks. Versions prior to Node.js 0.11.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-8861.title: Node.js handlebars.js Package CVE-2015-8861 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2015-8861.body: The handlebars.js Package for Node.js is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. Versions prior to handlebars.js Package 4.0.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-8862.title: Node.js mustache.js Package CVE-2015-8862 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2015-8862.body: The mustache.js Package for Node.js is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. Versions prior to mustache.js Package 2.2.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-8870.title: LibTIFF CVE-2015-8870 Integer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2015-8870.body: LibTIFF is prone to an integer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service condition. Due to the nature of this issue, arbitrary code execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed. Versions prior to LibTIFF 4.0.4 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-8951.body: Linux Kernel is prone to a memory corruption vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the kernel. Failed exploits may result in denial-of-service conditions. This issue is being tracked by Android Bug ID A-30142668.

CVE-2015-8974.title: MyBB Prior to 1.8.6 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-8974.body: MyBB is prone to the following security vulnerabilities: 1. An SQL-injection vulnerability 2. A security bypass vulnerability 3. Multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities 4. An information disclosure vulnerability Exploiting these vulnerabilities could allow an attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, compromise the affected application, access or modify data, disclose sensitive information, bypass security restrictions or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Versions prior to MyBB 1.8.6 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-8976.title: MyBB Prior to 1.8.6 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-8976.body: MyBB is prone to the following security vulnerabilities: 1. An SQL-injection vulnerability 2. A security bypass vulnerability 3. Multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities 4. An information disclosure vulnerability Exploiting these vulnerabilities could allow an attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, compromise the affected application, access or modify data, disclose sensitive information, bypass security restrictions or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Versions prior to MyBB 1.8.6 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-8978.title: Perl Soap Lite Extension CVE-2015-8978 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-8978.body: Soap Lite extension for is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause the application to enter an infinite loop and consume excessive CPU resources, resulting in denial-of-service conditions. Soap Lite 1.14 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-8982.title: GNU glibc 'strxfrm()' Function Local Integer Overflow and Stack Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-8982.body: GNU glibc is prone to a local integer-overflow vulnerability and a local stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability Successful exploits may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of a user running an application that uses the affected library. Failed exploit attempts may crash the application, denying service to legitimate users. glibc 2.3 through versions prior to 2.21 are vulnerable. Note: This issue was previously titled 'GNU glibc 'strxfrm()' Routine Integer Overflow Vulnerability'. The title have been changed to better document it.

CVE-2015-8983.title: GNU glibc 'libio/wstrops.c' Local Integer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2015-8983.body: GNU glibc is prone to a local integer-overflow vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of a user running an application that uses the affected library. Failed exploit attempts may crash the application, denying service to legitimate users. Note: This issue was previously titled 'GNU glibc 'libio/wstrops.c' Integer Overflow Vulnerability'. The title have been changed to better document it.

CVE-2015-8984.title: GNU glibc 'fnmatch_loop.c' Local Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2015-8984.body: GNU glibc is prone to a local buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. A local attacker can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, resulting in denial-of-service conditions. Due to the nature of this issue, arbitrary code execution may be possible but this has not been confirmed. Note: This issue was previously titled 'GNU glibc 'fnmatch_loop.c' Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability'. The title have been changed to better document it.

CVE-2015-9005.body: Google Android is prone to an unspecified security vulnerability. Little is known about this issue or its effects at this time. We will update this BID as more information emerges. This issue is being tracked by Android Bug ID A-36393500.

CVE-2015-0247.title: e2fsprogs 'lib/ext2fs/openfs.c' Local Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2015-0247.body: e2fsprogs is prone to a local heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. Versions prior to e2fsprogs 1.42.12 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-0248.title: Apache Subversion CVE-2015-0248 Multiple Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-0248.body: Apache Subversion is prone to multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities. An attacker may exploit these issues to crash the affected application, resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2015-0252.title: Xerces-C++ CVE-2015-0252 XML Parsing Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-0252.body: Xerces-C++ is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause applications to crash with a segmentation fault, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2015-0255.title: X.Org X Server 'xkb/xkb.c' Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2015-0255.body: X.Org X Server is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability that lets X clients read arbitrary X server memory. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2015-0260.title: Kallithea CVE-2015-0260 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2015-0260.body: Kallithea is prone to an information disclosure vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow an attacker to gain access to sensitive information that may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2015-0261.title: tcpdump CVE-2015-0261 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-0261.body: tcpdump is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can leverage this issue to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2015-0268.title: Xen CVE-2015-0268 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-0268.body: Xen is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the application, effectively denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2015-0272.title: GNOME NetworkManager 'ipv6/addrconf.c' Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-0272.body: GNOME NetworkManager is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the affected application denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2015-0282.title: GnuTLS CVE-2015-0282 Certificate Validation Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2015-0282.body: GnuTLS is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue allows attackers to perform man-in-the-middle attacks and bypass certain security restrictions. Versions prior to GnuTLS 3.1.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-0283.title: slapi-nis Directory Server Plugin CVE-2015-0283 Multiple Remote Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-0283.body: slapi-nis Directory Server plugin are prone to multiple remote denial-of-service vulnerabilities. Successful exploits may allow an attacker to cause excessive CPU usage, resulting in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2015-0285.title: OpenSSL CVE-2015-0285 Insufficient Entropy Security Weakness
CVE-2015-0285.body: OpenSSL is prone to a security weakness. An attacker can exploit this issue to guess the generated key that can aid in further attacks. OpenSSL versions prior to 1.0.2a are vulnerable. Note: This issue was previously discussed in BID 73196 (OpenSSL Multiple UnspecifiedSecurity Vulnerabilities) but has been given its own record to better document it.

CVE-2015-0292.title: OpenSSL '/evp/encode.c' Remote Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2015-0292.body: OpenSSL is prone to a remote memory-corruption vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application using the vulnerable library. Failed exploit attempts will result in denial-of-service conditions. The following are vulnerable: OpenSSL 1.0.1 prior to 1.0.1h. OpenSSL 1.0.0 prior to 1.0.0m. OpenSSL 0.9.8 prior to 0.9.8za.

CVE-2015-0293.title: OpenSSL CVE-2015-0293 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-0293.body: OpenSSL is prone to denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker may exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition. The following are vulnerable: OpenSSL 1.0.2 prior to 1.0.2a OpenSSL 1.0.1 prior to 1.0.1m OpenSSL 1.0.0 prior to 1.0.0r OpenSSL 0.9.8 prior to 0.9.8zf

CVE-2015-0295.title: Qt 'qbmphandler.cpp' Divide-By-Zero Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-0295.body: Qt is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may cause crash in the application, resulting in denial-of-service conditions. Versions prior to Qt 5.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-0296.title: TeX Live CVE-2015-0296 Local Arbitrary File Deletion Vulnerability
CVE-2015-0296.body: TeX Live is prone to a local arbitrary-file-deletion vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to delete arbitrary files in the context of the affected system. This may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2015-0301.title: Adobe Flash Player and AIR CVE-2015-0301 Unspecified Security Vulnerability
CVE-2015-0301.body: Adobe Flash Player and Adobe AIR are prone to an unspecified security vulnerability. Note: The impact of this issue is currently unknown. We will update this BID when more information emerges.

CVE-2015-0304.title: Adobe Flash Player and AIR CVE-2015-0304 Unspecified Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2015-0304.body: Adobe Flash Player and AIR are prone to an unspecified heap-based buffer-overflow. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2015-0307.title: Adobe Flash Player and AIR CVE-2015-0307 Out of Bounds Read Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2015-0307.body: Adobe Flash Player and Adobe AIR are prone to a memory-corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions or gain access to sensitive information. other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2015-0309.title: Adobe Flash Player and AIR CVE-2015-0309 Unspecified Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2015-0309.body: Adobe Flash Player and AIR are prone to an unspecified heap-based buffer-overflow. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2015-0310.title: Adobe Flash Player CVE-2015-0310 Unspecified Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2015-0310.body: Adobe Flash Player is prone to an unspecified memory-corruption vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2015-0323.title: Adobe Flash Player Multiple Unspecified Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-0323.body: Adobe Flash Player is prone to multiple unspecified security vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed attacks may cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2015-0324.title: Adobe Flash Player Multiple Unspecified Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-0324.body: Adobe Flash Player is prone to multiple unspecified security vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed attacks may cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2015-0327.title: Adobe Flash Player Multiple Unspecified Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-0327.body: Adobe Flash Player is prone to multiple unspecified security vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed attacks may cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2015-0513.title: Multiple EMC Products CVE-2015-0513 Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-0513.body: Multiple EMC products are prone to multiple unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerabilities. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. The following products are vulnerable: Versions prior to EMC M&R 6.5u1 are vulnerable. CVE-2015-0851.body: XMLTooling-C is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to cause the application using affected library to crash, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2015-0856.title: SDDM 'Greeter.cpp' Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-0856.body: SDDM is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to crash the application resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2015-0899.title: Apache Struts CVE-2015-0899 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2015-0899.body: Apache Struts is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. This may lead to further attacks. Versions prior to Apache Struts 1.2.9 SP2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-0922.title: McAfee ePolicy Orchestrator CVE-2015-0922 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2015-0922.body: McAfee ePolicy Orchestrator is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information from the application; this may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2015-0935.title: Bomgar Remote Support CVE-2015-0935 Arbitrary PHP Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2015-0935.body: Bomgar Remote Support is prone to an arbitrary PHP code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary PHP code within the context of the web server process. Bomgar Remote Support 14.3.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2015-0986.title: Multiple Moxa Products CVE-2015-0986 ActiveX Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2015-0986.body: Multiple Moxa products are prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it to an insufficiently sized memory buffer. Successfully exploiting this issue allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application using the ActiveX control. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2015-1000.title: Moxa SoftCMS CVE-2015-1000 Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2015-1000.body: Moxa SoftCMS is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in denial-of-service conditions. Moxa SoftCMS 1.2 is vulnerable.

CVE-2015-1008.title: Emerson AMS Device Manager CVE-2015-1008 Local SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2015-1008.body: Emerson AMS Device Manager is prone to a local SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. An authenticated attacker can exploit this issue to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. AMS Device Manager 12.5 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-1039.title: ZfcUser 'redirect' Parameter Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2015-1039.body: ZfcUser is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2015-1040.title: BEdita CMS 'index.php' Multiple HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-1040.body: BEdita CMS is prone to multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Attacker supplied HTML and script code could be executed in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user; other attacks are also possible. BEdita 3.4.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2015-1041.title: e107 '/e107_admin/filemanager.php' Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2015-1041.body: e107 is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. e107 1.0.4 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2015-1043.body: Multiple VMware products are prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. CVE-2015-1131.body: Apple Mac OS X is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities that have been addressed in Security Update 2015-004. CVE-2015-1306.body: Sympa is prone to a file-disclosure vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information stored in arbitrary files, that may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2015-1323.body: Aptdaemon is prone to a local security-bypass vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to bypass security restrictions and gain access to sensitive information contained in certain files.

CVE-2015-1324.body: Apport is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this vulnerability to gain root privileges.

CVE-2015-1329.body: Ubuntu oxide-qt Package is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2015-1332.title: Ubuntu oxide-qt Package CVE-2015-1332 Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2015-1332.body: Ubuntu oxide-qt Package is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary-checks on user supplied data. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user invoking the program. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2015-1333.body: The Linux Kernel is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to exhaust available memory, resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2015-1351.body: PHP is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability due to a user-after-free condition. An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2015-1366.title: WordPress WassUp Plugin 'main.php' Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2015-1366.body: The WassUp plugin for WordPress is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2015-1368.title: Ansible Tower Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-1368.body: Ansible Tower is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. CVE-2015-1371.title: FerretCMS Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-1371.body: FerretCMS is prone to the following security vulnerabilities: 1. Multiple SQL-Injection vulnerabilities 2. A cross-site scripting vulnerability 3. Multiple HTML-Injection vulnerabilities 4. An arbitrary file upload vulnerability Exploiting these vulnerabilities could allow an attacker-supplied HTML or JavaScript code could run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to control how the site is rendered to the user, compromise the application, access or modify data, exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database and to upload arbitrary files. FerretCMS 1.0.4-alpha is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2015-1396.body: GNU patch is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. Remote attackers can use specially crafted requests with directory-traversal sequences ('../') to overwrite arbitrary files in the context of the application. This may aid in further attacks. Note: This issue is the result of an incomplete fix for the issue described in 72074 (GNU patch Directory Traversal Vulnerability).

CVE-2015-1773.title: Apache Flex 'asdoc/templates/index.html' Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2015-1773.body: Apache Flex is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary HTML and script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Versions prior to Apache Flex 4.14.1 are vulnerable.

Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions. Apache OpenOffice versions 4.1.1 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-1781.title: GNU glibc CVE-2015-1781 Multiple Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-1781.body: GNU glibc is prone to multiple buffer-overflow vulnerabilities because it fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. An attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts may crash the application, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2015-1782.body: libssh2 is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users or to gain access to sensitive information. libssh2 1.4.3 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-1795.title: Red Hat Gluster Storage Server CVE-2015-1795 Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2015-1795.body: Red Hat Gluster Storage Server is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges.

CVE-2015-1802.title: X.Org libXfont 'bitmap/bdfread.c' Out of Bounds Local Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2015-1802.body: X.Org libXfont is prone to a local buffer-overflow vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the X.Org server. Failed exploit attempts will result in denial-of-service conditions. libXfont versions prior to 1.4.9, and 1.5.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-1804.title: X.Org libXfont BDF Font File Handling CVE-2015-1804 Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2015-1804.body: The 'libXfont' library is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the application. Failed attacks may cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2015-1819.title: Libxml2 CVE-2015-1819 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-1819.body: Libxml2 is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Successful exploit will allow attackers to consume large amounts of memory and cause a crash through a specially crafted XML containing malicious attributes.

CVE-2015-1821.title: Chrony CVE-2015-1821 Out of Bounds Write Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2015-1821.body: Chrony is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. An attacker could exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application using the library. Failed exploit attempts may result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2015-1830.title: Apache ActiveMQ CVE-2015-1830 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2015-1830.body: Apache ActiveMQ is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using directory-traversal characters ('../') to create arbitrary files in the target directory and perform other attacks. Apache ActiveMQ 5.x versions prior to 5.11.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-1833.title: Apache Jackrabbit CVE-2015-1833 XML External Entity Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2015-1833.body: Apache Jackrabbit is prone to an XML External Entity vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information from the application; this may lead to further attacks. Versions prior to Apache Jackrabbit 2.10.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-1840.title: Ruby on Rails jquery-ujs and jquery-rails CVE-2015-1840 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2015-1840.body: Ruby on Rails jquery-ujs and jquery-rails are prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2015-1843.title: Docker CVE-2015-1843 Incomplete Fix Man in the Middle Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2015-1843.body: Docker is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to perform man-in-the-middle attacks and perform unauthorized actions. Successful exploits may lead to other attacks. Note: This issue is the result of an incomplete fix for the issue described in 71156 (Docker and Docker-py CVE-2014-5277 Man in the Middle Information Disclosure Vulnerability). Versions prior to Docker 1.5.0-28 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-1845.title: unzoo 'EntrReadArch()' Function Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2015-1845.body: unzoo is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts may crash the application, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2015-1846.title: unzoo CVE-2015-1846 Multiple Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-1846.body: unzoo is prone to multiple remote denial-of-service vulnerabilities. A remote attacker may exploit these issues to trigger denial-of-service condition due to excessive CPU resource utilization.

CVE-2015-1848.title: pcs daemon CVE-2015-1848 Remote Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2015-1848.body: pcs daemon is prone to a remote privilege-escalation vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges within the context o the application.

CVE-2015-1856.title: OpenStack Swift CVE-2015-1856 Arbitrary File Deletion Vulnerability
CVE-2015-1856.body: OpenStack Swift is prone to an arbitrary file-deletion vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to delete object files; this may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2015-1858.title: Qt 'qbmphandler.cpp' Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2015-1858.body: Qt is prone to a remote memory-corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2015-1859.title: Qt 'qicohandler.cpp' Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2015-1859.body: Qt is prone to a remote memory-corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2015-1859.title: RETIRED: Dnsmasq CVE-2015-1859 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2015-1859.body: Dnsmasq is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to access sensitive information. Information obtained may lead to further attacks. NOTE: This BID is being retired as it is a duplicate of BID 74307 (Qt 'qicohandler.cpp' Memory Corruption Vulnerability).

CVE-2015-1860.title: Qt 'qgifhandler.cpp' Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2015-1860.body: Qt is prone to a remote memory-corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2015-1863.title: wpa_supplicant CVE-2015-1863 Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2015-1863.body: wpa_supplicant is prone to a remote heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2015-1867.title: Pacemaker CVE-2015-1867 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2015-1867.body: Pacemaker is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. This may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2015-1868.title: Multiple PowerDNS Products CVE-2015-1868 Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-1868.body: Multiple PowerDNS products are prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can leverage this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition; denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2015-1870.title: Abrt CVE-2015-1870 Multiple Local Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-1870.body: Abrt is prone to multiple local information-disclosure vulnerabilities. Local attackers can exploit these issues to obtain sensitive information. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2015-1872.title: FFmpeg CVE-2015-1872 Out of Bounds Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-1872.body: FFmpeg is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users. Due to the nature of this issue, code-execution may be possible; however this has not been confirmed.

CVE-2015-1880.title: Fortinet FortiOS CVE-2015-1880 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2015-1880.body: Fortinet FortiOS is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2015-2117.body: Multiple HP products are prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. A remote attacker may be able to execute arbitrary code in the context of the SMS user. Failed exploit attempts will result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2015-2126.body: HP-UX is prone to an unspecified local privilege-escalation vulnerability. An attacker with local access could potentially exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges.

CVE-2015-2134.body: HP System Management Homepage is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. CVE-2015-2141.title: Crypto++ CVE-2015-2141 Information Disclosure Vulnerability

CVE-2015-2149.body: MyBB is prone to multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. MyBB 1.8.3 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2015-2150.title: Xen CVE-2015-2150 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2150.body: Xen is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the application, effectively denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2015-2151.title: Xen CVE-2015-2151 Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2151.body: Xen is prone to a memory-corruption vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow attackers to gain access to sensitive data or to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed attacks may cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2015-2152.title: Xen CVE-2015-2152 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2152.body: Xen is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2015-2153.body: tcpdump is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability because it fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied data. An attacker can leverage this issue to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users.

Attackers can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting user to view a specially crafted webpage. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions. Internet Explorer 9, 10 and 11 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-2492.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer CVE-2015-2492 Remote Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2492.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a remote memory-corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions. Internet Explorer 7, 8, 9, 10 and 11 are vulnerable.

The following versions are vulnerable: Internet Explorer 7, 8, 9, 10 and 11 Edge

CVE-2015-2504.title: Microsoft .NET Framework CVE-2015-2504 Remote Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2504.body: Microsoft .NET Framework is prone to a remote privilege-escalation vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges in the context of the currently logged-in user; this can also result in the attacker gaining complete control of the affected system.

CVE-2015-2506.title: Microsoft Windows OpenType Fonts CVE-2015-2506 Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2506.body: Microsoft Windows is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges and execute arbitrary code on affected system. Note: This issue was previously titled 'Microsoft Windows OpenType Fonts CVE-2015-2506 Denial of Service Vulnerability'. The title has been changed to better reflect security impact and the vulnerability information.

CVE-2015-2507.title: Microsoft Windows Adobe Font Driver CVE-2015-2507 Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2507.body: Microsoft Windows is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges.

CVE-2015-2508.title: Microsoft Windows Adobe Font Driver CVE-2015-2508 Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2508.body: Microsoft Windows is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges and execute arbitrary code on affected system.

CVE-2015-2510.title: Microsoft Windows OpenType Fonts CVE-2015-2510 Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2510.body: Microsoft Windows is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability. Successful exploits allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the vulnerable application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2015-2511.title: Microsoft Windows Kernel Mode Driver CVE-2015-2511 Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2511.body: Microsoft Windows is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in kernel mode with elevated privileges.

CVE-2015-2525.body: Microsoft Windows is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges in the context of the affected computer.

CVE-2015-2546.title: Microsoft Windows Kernel Mode Driver CVE-2015-2546 Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2546.body: Microsoft Windows is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in kernel mode with elevated privileges.

CVE-2015-2554.title: Microsoft Windows Object Reference CVE-2015-2554 Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2554.body: Microsoft Windows is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in kernel mode with elevated privileges.

CVE-2015-2665.title: Cacti CVE-2015-2665 HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2665.body: Cacti is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Attacker-supplied HTML and script code would run in the context of the affected website, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user.

CVE-2015-2668.title: ClamAV CVE-2015-2668 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2668.body: ClamAV is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users. Versions prior to ClamAV 0.98.7 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-2678.title: GeniXCMS CVE-2015-2678 Multiple HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-2678.body: GeniXCMS is prone to multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Attacker supplied HTML and script code could be executed in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user; other attacks are also possible. GeniXCMS 0.0.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2015-2679.title: MetalGenix GeniXCMS CVE-2015-2679 Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-2679.body: MetalGenix GeniXCMS is prone to multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.

CVE-2015-2680.title: GeniXCMS CVE-2015-2680 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2680.body: GeniXCMS is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. An attacker can exploit the cross-site request forgery issue to perform unauthorized actions in the context of a logged-in user of the affected application. This may aid in other attacks. GeniXCMS 0.0.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2015-2683.title: Citrix Command Center 'Advent JMX' Servlet Unauthorized Access Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2683.body: Citrix Command Center is prone to an unauthorized-access vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain unauthorized access to the affected application.

CVE-2015-2684.title: Shibboleth Service Provider CVE-2015-2684 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2684.body: Shibboleth Service Provider is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2015-2686.title: Linux Kernel 'iov_iter_init()' Function Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2686.body: Linux Kernel is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can leverage this issue to bypass security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2015-2694.title: MIT Kerberos 5 OTP and PKINIT kdcpreauth Modules Multiple Security Bypass Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-2694.body: MIT Kerberos 5 is prone to multiple security-bypass vulnerabilities. An attacker can leverage these issues to bypass security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2015-2697.title: MIT Kerberos 5 CVE-2015-2697 Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2697.body: MIT Kerberos 5 is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause the application to crash, resulting in denial-of-service conditions. Kerberos 5(krb5) 1.7 through 1.13 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-2710.title: Mozilla Firefox and Thunderbird MFSA 2015-48 through -58 Multiple Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-2710.body: Mozilla Firefox and Thunderbird are prone to following multiple vulnerabilities: 1. Multiple heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerabilities. [CVE-2015-2710, CVE-2015-2713, CVE-2015-2715] 2. A security-bypass vulnerability. [CVE-2015-2711] 3. An out-of-bounds read and write vulnerability. [CVE-2015-2712] 4. An information-disclosure vulnerability. [CVE-2015-2714] 5. A buffer-overflow vulnerability. [CVE-2015-2716] 6. An integer buffer-overflow vulnerability. [CVE-2015-2717] 7. A same-origin security-bypass vulnerability. [CVE-2015-2718] 8. A security vulnerability. [CVE-2015-2720] An attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the vulnerable application, crash affected applications, disclose sensitive information, bypass the same-origin policy and other security restrictions, and perform unauthorized actions; other attacks may also be possible. These issues are fixed in: Firefox 38 Firefox ESR 31.7 Thunderbird 31.7

CVE-2015-2721.title: Mozilla Network Security Services CVE-2015-2721 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2721.body: Mozilla Network Security Services is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks. Note: This issue was previously covered in BID 75541 (Mozilla Firefox/Thunderbird Multiple Security Vulnerabilities), but has been moved to its own record for better documentation. This issue is fixed in: Firefox 39 Firefox ESR 31.8 Firefox ESR 38.1 Firefox OS 2.2 SeaMonkey 2.35 Thunderbird 31.8 Thunderbird 38.1 Network Security Services 3.19.1

CVE-2015-2721.title: Mozilla Firefox/Thunderbird Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-2721.body: Mozilla Firefox and Thunderbird are prone to multiple security vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code, to gain elevated privileges, to access sensitive information, perform unauthorized actions, bypass security restrictions, and perform other attacks. Note #1: The issue described by CVE-2015-2721 has been moved to BID 83398 (Mozilla Network Security Services CVE-2015-2721 Security Bypass Vulnerability) for better documentation. Note #2: The issue described by CVE-2015-2730 has been moved to BID 83399 (Mozilla Network Security Services CVE-2015-2730 Security Bypass Vulnerability) for better documentation.

Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code, to gain elevated privileges, to access sensitive information, perform unauthorized actions, bypass security restrictions, and perform other attacks. Note #1: The issue described by CVE-2015-2721 has been moved to BID 83398 (Mozilla Network Security Services CVE-2015-2721 Security Bypass Vulnerability) for better documentation. Note #2: The issue described by CVE-2015-2730 has been moved to BID 83399 (Mozilla Network Security Services CVE-2015-2730 Security Bypass Vulnerability) for better documentation.
