CVE-2015-2752.title: Xen CVE-2015-2752 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2752.body: Xen is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers with access to a guest HVM operating system can exploit this issue to cause the CPU to exhaust resulting in a denial of service condition.

CVE-2015-2753.title: FreeXL Stack Based Buffer Overflow and Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-2753.body: FreeXL is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability and a denial-of-service vulnerability. Remote attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application or cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2015-2754.title: FreeXL Stack Based Buffer Overflow and Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-2754.body: FreeXL is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability and a denial-of-service vulnerability. Remote attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application or cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2015-2756.title: Xen CVE-2015-2756 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2756.body: Xen is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers with access to a guest HVM operating system can exploit this issue to cause a denial of service condition.

CVE-2015-2774.title: Erlang/OTP CVE-2015-2774 Man In The Middle Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2774.body: Erlang/OTP is prone to an information disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to perform man-in-the-middle attacks and obtain sensitive information. Successful exploits will lead to other attacks.

CVE-2015-2775.title: GNU Mailman 'Mailman/Utils.py' Local Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2775.body: GNU Mailman is prone to a local directory-traversal vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. Exploiting this issue will allow a local attacker to gain access to the contents of arbitrary files on the affected system. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2015-2776.title: FreeXL Stack Based Buffer Overflow and Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-2776.body: FreeXL is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability and a denial-of-service vulnerability. Remote attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application or cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2015-2778.title: Quassel CTCP Request Handling Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2778.body: Quassel is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability because it fails to properly handle CTCP requests. An attacker may exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2015-2779.title: Quassel CVE-2015-2779 Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2779.body: Quassel is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker may exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition. Versions prior to Quassel 0.12-rc are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-2782.title: ARJ 'decode.c' Local Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2782.body: ARJ is prone to a local buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks. Local attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2015-2783.title: PHP PHAR CVE-2015-2783 Remote Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2783.body: PHP is prone to a remote memory-corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information or crash the application resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2015-2788.title: DBD-Firebird 'dbdimp.c' Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2788.body: DBD-Firebird is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate bounds checks on user-supplied input. Successful attacks will allow attackers to execute arbitrary code within the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2015-2790.title: Multiple Foxit products CVE-2015-2790 Multiple Memory Corruption Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-2790.body: Multiple Foxit products are prone to multiple memory-corruption vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions. The following products are affected: Foxit Reader 7.0.6.1126 and prior Foxit Enterprise Reader 7.0.6.1126 and prior Foxit PhantomPDF 7.0.6.1126 and prior

CVE-2015-2802.title: HP SiteScope  Remote Unspecified Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2802.body: HP SiteScope is prone to an unspecified information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information from the application; this may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2015-2805.title: Multiple Alcatel-Lucent OmniSwitch Products CVE-2015-2805 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2805.body: Multiple Alcatel-Lucent OmniSwitch products are prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to perform unauthorized actions in the context of a logged-in user of the affected application. This may aid in other attacks

CVE-2015-2806.title: GNU Libtasn1 'parser_aux.c' Stack Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2806.body: GNU Libtasn1 is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. A remote attacker may exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2015-2809.title: Multiple Products Multicast DNS (mDNS) Implementation Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2809.body: Multiple products are prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information or crash the system, resulting in a denial-of-service condition. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2015-2831.title: das_watchdog 'XAUTHORITY' Environment Variable Handling Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2831.body: das_watchdog is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2015-2851.title: Synology Cloud Station sync client CVE-2015-2851 Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2851.body: Synology Cloud Station sync client is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. Exploiting this issue allows local attackers to gain root privileges. Synology Cloud Station sync client 1.1-2291 versions prior to 3.2-3475 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-2852.title: Blue Coat Multiple SSL Visibility Appliances Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-2852.body: Blue Coat Multiple SSL Visibility Appliances are prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability, a session-fixation vulnerability, a clickjacking vulnerability, and an information-disclosure. Successfully exploiting these vulnerabilities will allow attackers to perform certain unauthorized actions, hijack an arbitrary session, gain access to the sensitive information or compromise the affected application. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2015-2854.title: Blue Coat Multiple SSL Visibility Appliances Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-2854.body: Blue Coat Multiple SSL Visibility Appliances are prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability, a session-fixation vulnerability, a clickjacking vulnerability, and an information-disclosure. Successfully exploiting these vulnerabilities will allow attackers to perform certain unauthorized actions, hijack an arbitrary session, gain access to the sensitive information or compromise the affected application. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2015-2855.title: Blue Coat Multiple SSL Visibility Appliances Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-2855.body: Blue Coat Multiple SSL Visibility Appliances are prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability, a session-fixation vulnerability, a clickjacking vulnerability, and an information-disclosure. Successfully exploiting these vulnerabilities will allow attackers to perform certain unauthorized actions, hijack an arbitrary session, gain access to the sensitive information or compromise the affected application. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2015-2859.title: McAfee ePolicy Orchestrator CVE-2015-2859 SSL Certificate Validation Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2859.body: McAfee ePolicy Orchestrator is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability because the application fails to properly validate SSL certificates. Successfully exploiting this issue allows attackers to perform man-in-the-middle attacks and bypass certain security restrictions.

CVE-2015-2860.title: Avigilon Control Center CVE-2015-2860 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2860.body: Avigilon Control Center is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using directory-traversal characters ('../') to access arbitrary files that contain sensitive information and perform other attacks.

CVE-2015-2861.title: Vesta Control Panel CVE-2015-2861 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2861.body: Vesta Control Panel is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to perform unauthorized actions in the context of a logged-in user of the affected application. This may aid in other attacks. Vesta Control Panel 0.9.8-12 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-2868.title: Trane ComfortLink II CVE-2015-2868 Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2868.body: Trane ComfortLink II is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts may cause a denial-of-service condition. Trane ComfortLink II 2.0.2 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2015-2869.title: Total Commander File Info Plugin CVE-2015-2869 Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2869.body: The File Info plugin for Total Commander is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to cause the application to terminate, resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2015-2872.title: Trend Micro Deep Discovery Inspector CVE-2015-2872 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2872.body: Trend Micro Deep Discovery Inspector is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.

CVE-2015-2877.title: Kernel Virtual Machine CVE-2015-2877 Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2877.body: Kernel Virtual Machine is prone to a memory-corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information or crash the application resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2015-2924.title: GNOME NetworkManager 'nm-lndp-rdisc.c' Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2924.body: GNOME NetworkManager is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2015-2931.title: MediaWiki Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-2931.body: MediaWiki is prone to the following security vulnerabilities: 1. An arbitrary file-upload vulnerability 2. Multiple security-bypass vulnerabilities 3. An HTML-injection vulnerability 4. Multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities 5. A privilege-escalation vulnerability 6. A cross-site scripting vulnerability 7. A cross-site request forgery vulnerability An attacker can exploit these issues to perform unauthorized actions, bypass security restrictions, cause denial-of-service conditions, execute attacker-supplied HTML or JavaScript code in the context of the affected site, to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, upload arbitrary files, execute arbitrary code, or gain elevated privileges. This may aid in further attacks. Versions prior to MediaWiki 1.19.24, 1.23.9 and 1.24.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-2944.title: Apache Sling API and Sling Servlets CVE-2015-2944 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2944.body: Apache Sling API and Sling Servlets are prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. The following versions are vulnerable: Apache Sling API 2.2.0 and prior Apache Sling Servlets Post 2.1.0 and prior

CVE-2015-2946.title: SXF Common Library CVE-2015-2946 Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2946.body: SXF Common Library is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it to an insufficiently sized memory buffer. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in denial-of-service conditions. SXF Common Library 3.21 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-2948.title: Zenphoto CVE-2015-2948 Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2948.body: Zenphoto is prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Zenphoto 1.4.7 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-2949.title: ZenPhoto20 CVE-2015-2949 Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2949.body: ZenPhoto20 is prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2015-2950.title: Open Explorer Beta Application for Android CVE-2015-2950 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2950.body: Open Explorer Beta application for Android is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability. Exploiting this issue allows an attacker to perform unauthorized actions. Versions prior to Open Explorer Beta 0.254 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-2951.title: F21 JWT CVE-2015-2951 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2951.body: F21 JWT is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow attackers to bypass certain intended security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions which may aid in launching further attacks. Versions prior to F21 JWT 2.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-2953.title: Multiple MilkyStep Products CVE-2015-2953 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2953.body: Multiple MilkyStep products are prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2015-2954.title: Multiple MilkyStep Products CVE-2015-2954 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2954.body: Multiple MilkyStep products are prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability because it fails to properly validate HTTP requests. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. The following products are vulnerable: MilkyStep Light 0.94 and prior MilkyStep Professional 1.82 and prior MilkyStep Professional OEM 1.82 and prior

CVE-2015-2955.title: MilkyStep CVE-2015-2955 OS Command Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2955.body: MilkyStep is prone to an OS command-injection vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary OS commands in the context of the affected application.

CVE-2015-2956.title: MilkyStep CVE-2015-2956 Unspecified SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2956.body: MilkyStep is prone to an unspecified SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.

CVE-2015-2958.title: Multiple MilkyStep Products CVE-2015-2958 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2958.body: Multiple MilkyStep products are prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2015-2960.title: NetFlow Analyzer CVE-2015-2960 Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2960.body: NetFlow Analyzer is prone to an unspecified cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. NetFlow Analyzer build 10250 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-2961.body: NetFlow Analyzer is prone to a cross-site request forgery vulnerability because it fails to properly validate HTTP requests. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2015-2962.title: CGI RESCUE BloBee CVE-2015-2962 Arbitrary Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2962.body: CGI RESCUE BloBee is prone to an arbitrary code-execution vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in context of the user or to cause a denial of service conditions. CGI RESCUE BloBee 1.20 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-2963.title: Ruby On Rails Paperclip CVE-2015-2963 Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2963.body: Ruby On Rails Paperclip is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. Paperclip 4.2.1 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-2964.title: namshi/jose CVE-2015-2964 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2964.body: namshi/jose is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. This may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2015-2965.title: osCommerce Japanese CVE-2015-2965 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2965.body: osCommerce Japanese is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. A remote attacker can use directory-traversal strings to retrieve arbitrary files in the context of the affected application.

CVE-2015-2984.title: Multiple I-O DATA DEVICE Routers CVE-2015-2984 Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-2984.body: Multiple I-O DATA DEVICE routers are prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can leverage this issue to cause denial-of-service condition. The following products are vulnerable: NP-BBRS and WN-G54/R2 versions prior to 1.03

CVE-2015-3003.body: Juniper Junos is prone to multiple local privilege escalation vulnerabilities. Local attackers can exploit these issues to gain root privileges.

CVE-2015-3004.title: Juniper Junos J-Web CVE-2015-3004 Clickjacking Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3004.body: Juniper Junos J-Web is prone to a clickjacking vulnerability because it fails to perform validity checks on certain user actions through HTTP requests. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2015-3011.title: ownCloud Multiple HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-3011.body: ownCloud Bookmarks App is prone to multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied data. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2015-3197.title: OpenSSL CVE-2015-3197 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3197.body: OpenSSL is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow attackers to perform unauthorized actions. This may lead to other attacks.

CVE-2015-3202.title: FUSE CVE-2015-3202 Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3202.body: FUSE is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this vulnerability to overwrite arbitrary files with root privileges.

CVE-2015-3204.title: Libreswan 'pluto/ikev1.c' Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3204.body: Libreswan is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause the affected application to restart, denying service to legitimate users. Libreswan 3.9 through 3.12 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-3206.title: python-kerberos 'checkPassword()' Function Man in the Middle Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3206.body: python-kerberos is prone to an information disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to disclose potentially sensitive information through man-in-the-middle attacks. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2015-3209.title: QEMU AMD PCnet Ethernet Emulation Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3209.body: QEMU is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code on the host with the privileges of the hosting QEMU process. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2015-3214.title: QEMU 'pit_ioport_read()' Function Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3214.body: QEMU is prone to a memory-corruption vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary-checks on user-supplied data. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code on the host with the privileges of the hosting QEMU process. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2015-3216.title: OpenSSL 'ssleay_rand_bytes()' Function Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3216.body: OpenSSL is prone to denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker may exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2015-3217.title: PCRE 'match()' Function Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3217.body: PCRE is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2015-3219.title: OpenStack Horizon CVE-2015-3219 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3219.body: OpenStack Horizon is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.

CVE-2015-3222.title: OSSEC CVE-2015-3222 Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3222.body: OSSEC is prone to a remote-code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with root privileges. Failed exploit attempts will cause a denial-of-service condition. OSSEC versions 2.7 through 2.8.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-3223.title: Samba ldb 'ldb_wildcard_compare()' Function Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3223.body: Samba ldb is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Exploiting this issue allows attackers to trigger denial-of-service conditions due to excessive CPU consumption.

CVE-2015-3226.title: JSON 'ActiveSupport::JSON.encode()' Function Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3226.body: JSON is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.

CVE-2015-3228.title: Ghostscript 'gs/base/gsmalloc.c' Integer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3228.body: Ghostscript is prone to a remote integer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of a user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts may crash the application, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2015-3229.title: Project Atomic CVE-2015-3229 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3229.body: Project Atomic is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue through man-in-the-middle attacks to execute arbitrary code, which may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2015-3231.title: Drupal CVE-2015-3231 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3231.body: Drupal is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in launching further attacks. Drupal 7 versions prior to 7.38 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-3234.title: Drupal OpenID module CVE-2015-3234 Session Hijacking Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3234.body: Drupal is prone to a session-hijacking vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow an attacker to gain unauthorized access to the affected application or impersonate trusted servers, which will aid in further attacks.

CVE-2015-3237.title: cURL/libcURL 'smb_request_state()' Function Security Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3237.body: cURL/libcURL is prone to a security vulnerability that exists in the state machine function that handles the SMB protocol. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information or to cause a denial of service condition. cURL/libcURL 7.40.0 versions through 7.42.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-3238.title: Linux-PAM '_unix_run_helper_binary()' Function Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3238.body: Linux-PAM is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue will allow an attacker to cause denial-of-service condition and to harvest valid user accounts, which may aid in brute-force attacks.

CVE-2015-3239.title: libunwind 'dwarf_to_unw_regnum()' Function Local Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3239.body: libunwind is prone to a local security-bypass vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions.

CVE-2015-3240.title: Libreswan and Openswan CVE-2015-3240 Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3240.body: Libreswan and Openswan are prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2015-3241.title: OpenStack Nova CVE-2015-3241 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3241.body: OpenStack Nova is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2015-3244.title: Portlet Bridge for JavaServer Faces CVE-2015-3244 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3244.body: Portlet Bridge for JavaServer Faces is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability that affects the JavaServer Faces (JSF) functionality. Exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to access sensitive information that may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2015-3245.title: libuser CVE-2015-3245 Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3245.body: libuser is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2015-3246.title: libuser CVE-2015-3246 Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3246.body: libuser is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. A local attacker may exploit this issue to gain root privileges. Other attacks may also be possible.

CVE-2015-3256.title: polkit CVE-2015-3256 Local Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3256.body: polkit is prone to a local memory-corruption vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code, gain elevated privileges. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition. Versions prior to polkit 0.113 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-3258.title: cups-filters 'texttopdf' Remote Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3258.body: cups-filters is prone to a remote heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the 'lp' user. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2015-3259.title: Xen CVE-2015-3259 Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3259.body: Xen is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because the application fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input. A guest administrator can exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges to control the host.

CVE-2015-3267.title: Red Hat JBoss Operations Network CVE-2015-3267 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3267.body: Red Hat JBoss Operations Network is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. Versions prior to Red Hat JBoss Operations Network 3.3.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-3269.title: Adobe LiveCycle Data Services CVE-2015-3269 XML External Entity Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3269.body: Adobe LiveCycle Data Services is prone to an information disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2015-3279.title: cups-filters CVE-2015-3279 Remote Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3279.body: cups-filters is prone to a remote heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the 'lp' user. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2015-3281.title: HAProxy CVE-2015-3281 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3281.body: HAProxy is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2015-3288.title: Linux Kernel 'mm/memory.c' Local Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3288.body: Linux Kernel is prone to a local code-execution vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application.

CVE-2015-3290.title: Linux Kernel 'x86/entry/entry_64.S' Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3290.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. Local attackers may exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges.

CVE-2015-3296.title: Multiple Products 'index.js' Multiple HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-3296.body: Multiple products are prone to multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities because they fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. Attacker supplied HTML and script code could be executed in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or control how the site is rendered to the user; other attacks are also possible. The following products are vulnerable: Versions prior to markdown-it 4.1.0 are vulnerable. Versions prior to NodeBB 0.70 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-3297.title: Etherpad Lite 'utils/Minify.js' Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3297.body: Etherpad Lite is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability. A remote attacker could exploit this issue using directory-traversal characters ('../') to access or read arbitrary files that contain sensitive information or to access files outside of the restricted directory to obtain sensitive information and perform other attacks.

CVE-2015-3307.title: PHP PHAR 'phar_tar_process_metadata()' Function Heap Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3307.body: PHP is prone to a heap-memory-corruption vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2015-3310.title: PPP 'rc_mksid()' Function Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3310.body: PPP is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. Exploiting this issue may allow remote attackers to crash the affected application, causing denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2015-3317.title: CA Common Services Multiple Local Privilege Escalation And Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-3317.body: CA Common Services is prone to multiple local privilege-escalation and local buffer-overflow vulnerabilities. Local attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary with elevated privileges. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2015-3318.title: CA Common Services Multiple Local Privilege Escalation And Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-3318.body: CA Common Services is prone to multiple local privilege-escalation and local buffer-overflow vulnerabilities. Local attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary with elevated privileges. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2015-3329.title: PHP CVE-2015-3329 Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3329.body: PHP is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2015-3330.title: PHP 'sapi/apache2handler/sapi_apache2.c' Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3330.body: PHP is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2015-3336.title: Google Chrome CVE-2015-3336 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3336.body: Google Chrome is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to crash the application, resulting in denial-of-service conditions. Versions prior to Chrome 42.0.2311.90 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-3337.title: Elasticsearch CVE-2015-3337 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3337.body: Elasticsearch is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using directory-traversal characters ('../') to access arbitrary files that contain sensitive information and perform other attacks. Versions prior to Elasticsearch 1.5.2 and 1.4.5 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-3340.title: Xen CVE-2015-3340 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3340.body: Xen is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2015-3343.title: Drupal OPAC Module Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3343.body: The OPAC module for Drupal is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. OPAC 7.x-2.x prior to 7.x-2.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-3344.title: Drupal Course Module Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-3344.body: The Course module for Drupal is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. The following versions are affected: Course 6.x-1.x prior to 6.x-1.2 Course 7.x-1.x prior to 7.x-1.4

CVE-2015-3345.title: Drupal PHPList Integration Module SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3345.body: The PHPList Integration Module for Drupal is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. PHPList Integration 6.x-1.x versions prior to 6.x-1.7 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-3346.title: Drupal WikiWiki Module Unspecified SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3346.body: WikiWiki Module for Drupal is prone to an unspecified SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. WikiWiki 6.x-1.x versions prior to 6.x-1.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-3347.title: Cloudwords for Multilingual Drupal Module Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-3347.body: The Cloudwords for Multilingual Drupal module for Drupal is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability and a cross-site scripting vulnerability. An attacker can exploit the cross-site request-forgery issue to perform unauthorized actions in the context of a user's session. This may aid in other attacks. The attacker can exploit the cross-site scripting issue to execute arbitrary script code in the context of the vulnerable site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2015-3348.title: Cloudwords for Multilingual Drupal Module Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-3348.body: The Cloudwords for Multilingual Drupal module for Drupal is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability and a cross-site scripting vulnerability. An attacker can exploit the cross-site request-forgery issue to perform unauthorized actions in the context of a user's session. This may aid in other attacks. The attacker can exploit the cross-site scripting issue to execute arbitrary script code in the context of the vulnerable site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2015-3349.title: Drupal Htaccess Module Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3349.body: The Htaccess module for Drupal is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. Htaccess 7.x-2.x prior to 7.x-2.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-3350.title: Drupal Todo Filter Module Multiple Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-3350.body: The Todo Filter for Drupal is prone to multiple cross-site request-forgery vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. Todo Filter versions 6.x-1.0 and 7.x-1.0 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-3351.title: Drupal Log Watcher Module Multiple Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-3351.body: The Log Watcher module for Drupal is prone to multiple cross-site request-forgery vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. CVE-2015-3622.body: GNU Libtasn1 is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. A remote attacker may exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2015-3632.title: Multiple Foxit products Multiple Memory Corruption Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-3632.body: Multiple Foxit products are prone to multiple memory-corruption vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to crash the application, resulting in a denial-of-service condition. The following products are vulnerable: Foxit Reader 7.1.0.306 and 7.1.3.320 Foxit Enterprise Reader 7.1.0.306 and 7.1.3.320 Foxit PhantomPDF 7.1.0.306, 7.1.2.311 and 7.1.3.320

CVE-2015-3633.title: Multiple Foxit products Multiple Memory Corruption Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-3633.body: Multiple Foxit products are prone to multiple memory-corruption vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to crash the application, resulting in a denial-of-service condition. The following products are vulnerable: Foxit Reader 7.1.0.306 and 7.1.3.320 Foxit Enterprise Reader 7.1.0.306 and 7.1.3.320 Foxit PhantomPDF 7.1.0.306, 7.1.2.311 and 7.1.3.320

CVE-2015-3634.title: WordPress Slideshow Plugin 'SlideshowPluginSlideshowStyleshe' Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3634.body: Slideshow plugin for WordPress is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information that may aid in further attacks. Slideshow 2.2.8 through 2.2.21 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-3643.title: usb-creator Local Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3643.body: usb-creator is prone to a local authentication-bypass vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and gain elevated privileges.

CVE-2015-3649.title: RubyGems open-uri-cached 'cached.rb' Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3649.body: RubyGems open-uri-cached is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges on affected computers. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2015-3659.title: WebKit Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-3659.body: WebKit is prone to the following multiple security vulnerabilities. 1. An information-disclosure vulnerability 2. A security-bypass vulnerability 3. An arbitrary code-execution vulnerability Attackers can exploit these issues to bypass security restrictions, to access sensitive information, to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user, and to redirect to an attacker-controlled site. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2015-3660.title: Apple Safari WebKit PDF CVE-2015-3660 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3660.body: Apple Safari is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow the attacker to gain access to sensitive information. Information obtained may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2015-3661.title: Apple Mac OS X Prior to 10.10.4 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-3661.body: Apple Mac OS X is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities. The update addresses new vulnerabilities that affect Admin Framework, afpserver, apache, AppleGraphicsControl, AppleFSCompression, AppleThunderboltEDMService, ATS, Bluetooth, Display Drivers, Intel Graphics Driver, IOAcceleratorFamily, IOFireWireFamily, Kernel, Install Framework Legacy, kext tools, ntfs, QuickTime, Security, Spotlight, and System Stats components. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code with system privileges, gain admin privileges, bypass security restrictions, cause denial-of-service conditions, obtain sensitive information, and perform other attacks. These issues affect OS X prior to 10.10.4.

CVE-2015-3664.body: Apple QuickTime is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. A remote attacker may exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code with system privileges, gain admin privileges, bypass security restrictions, cause denial-of-service conditions, obtain sensitive information, and perform other attacks. These issues affect OS X prior to 10.10.4.

CVE-2015-3721.title: Apple Mac OS X and iOS Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-3721.body: Apple Mac OS X and iOS are prone to the following security vulnerabilities: 1. Multiple memory-corruption vulnerabilities 2. Multiple information-disclosure vulnerabilities 3. A security vulnerability 4. Multiple buffer-overflow vulnerabilities An attacker can leverage these issues to obtain sensitive information, and execute arbitrary code with system privileges. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2015-3723.body: Apple iOS is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code, perform unauthorized actions, bypass security restrictions, and perform other attacks. Versions prior to iOS 8.4 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-3727.title: WebKit Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-3727.body: WebKit is prone to the following multiple security vulnerabilities. 1. An information-disclosure vulnerability 2. A security-bypass vulnerability 3. An arbitrary code-execution vulnerability Attackers can exploit these issues to bypass security restrictions, to access sensitive information, to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user, and to redirect to an attacker-controlled site. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2015-3730.title: WebKit Multiple Unspecified Memory Corruption Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-3730.body: WebKit is prone to multiple unspecified memory-corruption vulnerabilities. An attacker may exploit these issues by enticing victims into viewing a malicious webpage. Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected browser or cause denial-of-service conditions; other attacks may also be possible.

CVE-2015-3824.body: Google Stagefright Media Playback Engine is prone to multiple remote code execution vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code within context of the affected device; failed exploit attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2015-3885.body: dcraw is prone to a remote integer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of a user running the affected application. Failed exploit attempts may crash the application, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2015-3902.title: phpMyAdmin CVE-2015-3902 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3902.body: phpMyAdmin is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability because it does not properly validate HTTP requests. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions. This may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2015-3903.title: phpMyAdmin CVE-2015-3903 Man in the Middle Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3903.body: phpMyAdmin is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow attackers to perform unauthorized actions by conducting a man-in-the-middle attack. This may lead to other attacks.

CVE-2015-3905.title: t1utils Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3905.body: t1utils is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in denial-of-service conditions. t1utils 1.38-3 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2015-3906.title: Wireshark Android Logcat File Parser 'wiretap/logcat.c' Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3906.body: Wireshark is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can leverage this issue to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users. Wireshark 1.12.0 through 1.12.4 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-3921.title: Coppermine Photo Gallery 'contact.php' Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3921.body: Coppermine Photo Gallery is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks. Versions prior to Coppermine Photo Gallery 1.5.36 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-3923.title: Coppermine Photo Gallery CVE-2015-3923 Directory Enumeration Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3923.body: Coppermine Photo Gallery is prone to a directory-enumeration vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. A remote attacker can exploit this issue to enumerate existing folders; other attacks are also possible. Versions prior to Coppermine Photo Gallery 1.5.36 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-3935.title: Dolibarr CVE-2015-3935 Multiple HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-3935.body: Dolibarr is prone to multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied data. Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2015-3939.title: IDS RTU 850 Series CVE-2015-3939 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3939.body: IDS RTU 850 series is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability. Remote attackers can use specially crafted requests with directory-traversal sequences ('../') to overwrite arbitrary files in the context of the application. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2015-3940.title: Schneider Electric Wonderware System Platform DLL Loading Arbitrary Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3940.body: Schneider Electric Wonderware System Platform is prone to a local arbitrary-code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application or cause the application to crash, resulting in a denial-of-service condition. Wonderware System Platform 2014 R2 and prior are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-3942.title: GarrettCom Magnum 6k and 10k Products CVE-2015-3942 Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-3942.body: GarrettCom Magnum 6k and 10k Products are prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. The following products are vulnerable: Versions prior to Magnum 6K 4.5.6 Versions prior to Magnum 10K 4.5.6

CVE-2015-3949.title: Sinapsi eSolar Light  CVE-2015-3949 Plain Text Password Local Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3949.body: Sinapsi eSolar Light is prone to a local information-disclosure vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information such as saved passwords that may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2015-3950.title: XZERES 442SR Wind Turbine CVE-2015-3950 Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3950.body: XZERES 442SR Wind Turbine is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability because it fails to properly validate HTTP requests. An attacker can exploit this issue to perform unauthorized actions in the context of a logged-in user of the affected application. This may aid in other attacks.

CVE-2015-3951.title: RLE Nova-Wind Turbine HMI CVE-2015-3951 Plaintext Credentials Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3951.body: RLE Nova-Wind Turbine HMI is prone to an information disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to gain access to the sensitive information. Successful exploit results in a complete compromise of the affected system.

CVE-2015-3955.title: Multiple Hospira Products CVE-2015-3955 Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3955.body: Multiple Hospira products are prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it to an insufficiently sized memory buffer. A remote attacker may exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application. Failed attempts will likely cause a denial-of-service condition. The following products are available: Plum A+ Infusion System 13.4 and prior Plum A+3 Infusion System 13.6 and prior Symbiq Infusion System 3.13 and prior

CVE-2015-3960.title: GarrettCom Magnum 6K and 10K Switches Hardcoded Credentials Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3960.body: GarrettCom Magnum 6K and 10K Switches are prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain unauthorized access to the affected device.

CVE-2015-3961.body: GarrettCom Magnum 6K and 10K switches are prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Successful exploitation of the issue will cause the device to reload, denying service to legitimate users. The following products are affected: Magnum 6K switches versions prior to 4.5.6 Magnum 10K switches versions prior to 4.5.6

CVE-2015-3963.body: Wind River VxWorks is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information, to cause a denial-of-service condition and perform certain unauthorized actions; this may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2015-3978.body: SAP Sybase Unwired Platform Online Data Proxy is prone to a local information-disclosure vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information such as user credentials that may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2015-3980.body: SAP Customer Relationship Management is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. An attacker can exploit this issue to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.

CVE-2015-3981.title: SAP NetWeaver RFC SDK CVE-2015-3981 Unspecified Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3981.body: SAP NetWeaver RFC SDK is prone to an unspecified information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2015-3983.title: pcs daemon CVE-2015-3983 Remote Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2015-3983.body: pcs daemon is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability . An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2015-4001.body: Linux Kernel is prone to multiple heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerabilities because it fails to properly bounds-check user-supplied input. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2015-4002.body: The Linux Kernel is prone to multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues to cause denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2015-4004.body: Linux Kernel is prone to multiple memory-corruption vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to cause to obtain sensitive information.

CVE-2015-4020.body: RubyGems is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Successful exploits may allow attackers to bypass security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. CVE-2015-4021.body: PHP is prone to a remote memory-corruption vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2015-4022.body: PHP is prone to an integer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied data before copying it into an insufficiently sized buffer. CVE-2015-4024.body: PHP is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Successful exploitation of the issue will cause excessive CPU resource consumption, resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2015-4036.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local memory-corruption vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2015-4047.body: IPsec-Tools is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability caused by a NULL-pointer dereference error. Remote attackers may exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2015-4054.title: PgBouncer src/client.c' Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-4054.body: PgBouncer is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Remote attackers may exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2015-4082.body: Attic is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2015-4103.title: Xen CVE-2015-4103 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-4103.body: Xen is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service conditions, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2015-4104.title: Xen CVE-2015-4104 Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-4104.body: Xen is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to cause the host to crash, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2015-4105.title: Xen CVE-2015-4105 Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-4105.body: Xen is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2015-4111.title: BlackBerry Link CVE-2015-4111 Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2015-4111.body: BlackBerry Link is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2015-4129.title: Subrion CMS 'salt' Cookie SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2015-4129.body: Subrion CMS is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. An attacker can exploit this issue to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.

CVE-2015-4135.title: PHPWind Cross Site Scripting and Open Redirection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-4135.body: PHPWind is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability and an open-redirection vulnerability. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site, this may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks or by constructing a crafted URI and enticing a user to follow it and when an unsuspecting victim follows the link, they may be redirected to an attacker-controlled site.

CVE-2015-4148.title: PHP 'do_soap_call()' Function Type Confusion Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2015-4148.body: PHP is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability because of a type confusion error. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information that may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2015-4153.title: WordPress zM AJAX Login & Register Plugin CVE-2015-4153 Local File Include Vulnerability
CVE-2015-4153.body: zM AJAX Login & Register plugin for WordPress is prone to a local file-include vulnerability because it fails to adequately validate user-supplied input. An attacker can exploit this issue to obtain potentially sensitive information and execute arbitrary local scripts. This could allow the attacker to compromise the application and the computer; other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2015-4164.title: Xen CVE-2015-4164 Local Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-4164.body: Xen is prone to a local denial-of-service vulnerability. A local attacker with guest administrator permission can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2015-4165.title: Elasticsearch CVE-2015-4165 Arbitrary Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2015-4165.body: Elasticsearch is prone to an arbitrary code-execution vulnerability. An attacker could exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. ElasticSearch 1.0.0 through 1.5.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-4167.title: Linux Kernel 'fs/udf/inode.c' Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-4167.body: The Linux Kernel is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2015-4171.title: strongSwan VPN Client DNS Spoofing Vulnerability
CVE-2015-4171.body: strongSwan VPN Client is prone to a security vulnerability that may allow attackers to conduct spoofing attacks. Attackers can exploit this issue to conduct man-in-the-middle attacks and disclose sensitive information.

CVE-2015-4174.title: Siemens Climatix BACnet/IP Communication Module Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2015-4174.body: Siemens Climatix BACnet/IP communication module is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2015-4182.title: Cisco Identity Services Engine Software CVE-2015-4182 Multiple Privilege Escalation Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-4182.body: Cisco Identity Services Engine Software is prone to multiple privilege-escalation vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues to gain elevated privileges on an affected device. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCui72087.

CVE-2015-4183.title: Cisco Unified Computing System Central Software Arbitrary Command Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2015-4183.body: Cisco Unified Computing System Central Software is prone to an arbitrary command-execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute system commands on the underlying operating system. This issue being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCut32795.

CVE-2015-4184.title: Cisco Email Security Appliance CVE-2015-4184 Remote Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2015-4184.body: Cisco Email Security Appliance (ESA) is prone to a remote security-bypass vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID's CSCuu35853 and CSCuu37733.

CVE-2015-4185.title: Cisco IOS Software CVE-2015-4185 Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2015-4185.body: Cisco IOS Software is prone to a privilege-escalation vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to gain elevated privileges on an affected device. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCuq24202.

CVE-2015-4186.title: Cisco Virtualization Experience Client 6000 Series Local Arbitrary Command Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2015-4186.body: Cisco Virtualization Experience Client 6000 series devices are prone to a local arbitrary command-execution vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary commands on the underlying operating system with root privileges. This issue is being tracked by Cisco bug ID CSCug54412.

CVE-2015-4188.title: Cisco Prime Collaboration CVE-2015-4188 SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2015-4188.body: Cisco Prime Collaboration is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query. Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. This issue being tracked by Cisco Bug IDs CSCuu29910, CSCuu29928, and CSCuu59104.

CVE-2015-4191.title: Cisco IOS XR Software CVE-2015-4191 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-4191.body: Cisco IOS XR is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCuq95565.

CVE-2015-4194.title: Cisco WebEx Meeting Center CVE-2015-4194 User Enumeration Vulnerability
CVE-2015-4194.body: Cisco WebEx Meeting Center is prone to a user-enumeration vulnerability. An attacker may leverage this issue to harvest valid administrator accounts, which may aid in brute-force attacks. This issue being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCuf28861.

CVE-2015-4195.title: Cisco IOS XR Software SSH Disconnect Error CVE-2015-4195 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-4195.body: Cisco IOS XR is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker may exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCul63127.

CVE-2015-4198.title: Cisco Web Security Appliance CVE-2015-4198 HTTP Header Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2015-4198.body: Cisco Web Security Appliance is prone to an HTTP header-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user input. A successful attack may allow attackers to insert a crafted HTTP header into an HTTP response that could cause a web page redirection to a possible malicious website; this may aid in launching further attacks. This issue is tracked by Cisco BugId CSCuu24409.

CVE-2015-4200.title: Cisco IOS Software CVE-2015-4200 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-4200.body: Cisco IOS Software is prone to denial-of-service vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause denial-of-service condition. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCug00885.

CVE-2015-4204.body: Cisco IOS Software is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Note: Cisco uBR10000 Series Universal Broadband Routers running Cisco IOS Software are only affected. This issue is being tracked by Cisco Bug ID CSCue65051.

CVE-2015-4345.body: The RESTful Web Services module for Drupal is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to disclose sensitive information. Information obtained may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2015-4346.body: The SMS Framework module for Drupal is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. SMS Framework 6.x-1.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2015-4347.title: Drupal inLinks Integration Module Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2015-4347.body: The inLinks Integration module for Drupal is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2015-4348.body: The Spider Contacts module for Drupal is prone to multiple cross-site request-forgery and SQL-injection vulnerabilities. Attackers may exploit these issues to compromise the application, access or modify data, exploit vulnerabilities in the underlying database, or to perform unauthorized actions by enticing a logged-in user to visit a malicious site. This may lead to other vulnerabilities. Spider Contacts 6.x and 7.x are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2015-4349.title: Drupal Spider Contacts Module Multiple SQL Injection and Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-4349.body: The Spider Contacts module for Drupal is prone to multiple cross-site request-forgery and SQL-injection vulnerabilities. Attackers may exploit these issues to compromise the application, access or modify data, exploit vulnerabilities in the underlying database, or to perform unauthorized actions by enticing a logged-in user to visit a malicious site. This may lead to other vulnerabilities. Spider Contacts 6.x and 7.x are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2015-4350.title: Drupal Spider Catalog Module Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2015-4350.body: The Spider Catalog module for Drupal is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability because it does not properly validate HTTP requests. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. Spider Catalog 6.x and 7.x are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

Spider Video Player 6.x and 7.x are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2015-4352.title: Spider Video Player Module Arbitrary File Deletion and Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-4352.body: The Spider Video Player module for Drupal is prone to multiple cross-site request-forgery vulnerabilities and an arbitrary-file-deletion vulnerability. Attackers may exploit these issues to perform unauthorized actions by enticing a logged-in user to visit a malicious site and delete arbitrary files in the context of the application; this may aid in launching further attacks. Spider Video Player 6.x and 7.x are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2015-4353.title: Drupal Custom Sitemap Module Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2015-4353.body: The Custom Sitemap module for Drupal is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability because it does not properly validate HTTP requests. Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain unauthorized actions and gain access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. Custom Sitemap 7.x is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2015-4354.title: Drupal Ubercart Webform Integration Module Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-4354.body: The Ubercart Webform Integration module for Drupal is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. CVE-2015-5590.title: PHP 'phar_fix_filepath()' Function Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2015-5590.body: PHP is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because the application fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the PHP process. Failed exploit attempts will likely crash the webserver, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2015-5600.title: OpenSSH Login Handling Security Bypass Weakness
CVE-2015-5600.body: OpenSSH is prone to a security-bypass weakness. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions. This may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2015-5600.title: RETIRED: Oracle Integrated Lights Out Manager CVE-2015-5600 Remote Security Vulnerability
CVE-2015-5600.body: Oracle Integrated Lights Out Manager is prone to a remote security vulnerability in ILOM. The vulnerability can be exploited over the 'SSH' protocol. The 'SSH' sub component is affected. This vulnerability affects the following supported versions: 3.0, 3.1, 3.2 NOTE: This BID is being retired as it is a duplicate of BID 75990 (OpenSSH Login Handling Security Bypass Weakness).

CVE-2015-5610.title: N-Able N-Central RSMWinService Hardcoded Cryptographic Key Vulnerability
CVE-2015-5610.body: N-Able N-Central is prone to a hard-coded cryptographic key vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow attackers to obtain sensitive information that may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2015-5622.title: WordPress Prior to 4.2.3 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-5622.body: WordPress is prone to the following security vulnerabilities: 1. A cross-site scripting vulnerability 2. A security-bypass vulnerability 3. Multiple security vulnerabilities Successfully exploiting these issues may allow an attacker to bypass certain security restrictions, execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, and perform certain administrative actions in the vulnerable application. This may aid in further attacks.

CVE-2015-5654.title: Dojo Toolkit CVE-2015-5654 Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2015-5654.body: Dojo Toolkit is prone to an unspecified cross-site-scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.

CVE-2015-5674.title: FreeBSD routed(8) CVE-2015-5674 Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2015-5674.body: FreeBSD routed(8) is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to cause a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2015-5689.title: Symantec Ghost Explorer Utility Out of Bounds Array Indexing Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2015-5689.body: Symantec Ghost Explorer Utility is prone to a memory-corruption vulnerability. Successfully exploiting this issue may allow attackers to obtain sensitive information or to crash the affected application and perform unauthorized actions; denying service to legitimate users. The following products are vulnerable: Versions prior to Ghost Explorer Utility bundled with Symantec GSS 3.0 HF2 Versions prior to Ghost Explorer Utility bundled with Symantec DS 7.6 HF4

CVE-2015-5690.title: Symantec Web Gateway CVE-2015-5690 Unauthorized Access Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2015-5690.body: Symantec Web Gateway is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to bypass certain security restrictions, gain unauthorized access, and execute arbitrary OS commands with elevated privileges; this may aid in launching further attacks. Symantec Web Gateway versions 5.2.2 and prior vulnerable.

CVE-2015-5691.title: Symantec Web Gateway CVE-2015-5691 Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2015-5691.body: Symantec Web Gateway is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.

CVE-2015-5692.title: Symantec Web Gateway CVE-2015-5692 Arbitrary File Upload Vulnerability
CVE-2015-5692.body: Symantec Web Gateway is prone to an arbitrary file-upload vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to upload arbitrary code and run it in the context of the application. This may facilitate an arbitrary command execution with elevated privileges; other attacks are also possible.

CVE-2015-5693.title: Symantec Web Gateway CVE-2015-5693 Code Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2015-5693.body: Symantec Web Gateway is prone to a code-injection vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to inject or execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges.

CVE-2015-5697.title: Linux Kernel 'get_bitmap_file()' Function Local Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2015-5697.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local information-disclosure vulnerability. Local attackers can exploit this issue to cause a memory leak to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2015-5706.title: Linux Kernel 'path_openat()' Function Use After Free Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2015-5706.body: The Linux Kernel is prone to a use-after-free memory-corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in contexts of the application or corrupt the kernel memory. Failed exploit attempts can result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2015-5707.title: Linux Kernel '/scsi/sg.c' Integer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2015-5707.body: The Linux kernel is prone to an integer-overflow vulnerability. A local attacker can exploit this issue to crash an affected kernel, denying service to legitimate users. Given the nature of this issue, the attacker may also be able to execute arbitrary code, but this has not been confirmed.

CVE-2015-5714.title: WordPress CVE-2015-5714 Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2015-5714.body: WordPress is prone to a cross-site-scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.

CVE-2015-5715.title: WordPress CVE-2015-5715 Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2015-5715.body: WordPress is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to bypass security restrictions to perform unauthorized actions; this may aid in launching further attacks. WordPress versions prior to 4.3.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2015-5721.title: Malware Information Sharing Platform CVE-2015-5721 Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2015-5721.body: Malware Information Sharing Platform is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability.
